/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, stretches out into the distance, flanked by an array of buildings on one side and a smattering of trees on the other. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds that add a serene touch to the urban landscape. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
